title: Mention one advantage of crop rotation.

subtasks: Driving a tractor to plow the land
Using a cultivator to remove weeds from the land
Applying chemical treatments to control pests and diseases
Transplanting young plants into the field
Operating a watering system to irrigate the plants
Monitoring temperature and humidity levels in the greenhouse
Cutting ripe plants from the field
Sorting and packaging harvested produce
Using WhatsApp to address students' questions and concerns
Providing guidance through doubt-solving platforms
Preparing teaching resources related to agriculture
Updating content for advanced levels
Monitoring the growth of plants
Recording the improvement in yields
